column4: Hi, I have installed an ubuntu system and before getting a grub error out of partition I have made a snapshot. /boot is on /dev/sda1 and / is on /dev/mapper as I am using LVM. Can this be repaired, before I retry installing java or make any other huge changes to the fs?
you could  also try the boot-repair tool from a live cd. like the grub2 factoid mentions
So somehow installing jdk broke grub? or did i miss somthing.
